item.description:
Longing for Germany, Austria, Switzerland,Liechtenstein? Meet and sprechen mit fellow German speakers/students/native speakers! Come to a lively German Language Meetup to chat and build or keep fluency. Our members come from all over the world- at least 15 countries represented. Tell your friends!Willkommen! We meet in the back room of Panera Bread, 2542 Albany Avenue next to Staples at Bishop's Corner, West Hartford on the FIRST and THIRD Thursdays of each month.. It is in the northwest corner of the plaza. Bis dann!

Directions: If you are using mapquest or GPS, it will likely send you on a long uncomfortable route.  Best: I-84, exit 43, turn RIGHT then QUICK LEFT. You will be on TroutBrook Dr.  Stay on it until the first big intersection (Albany Ave) after you pass the UCONN branch.  Turn left on Albany Ave, then turn right at the thrid light, into the Staples/Panera parking lot.
item.name: The West Hartford German Kaffeeklatsch
